name: Triango
description:
The left side of the screen is Zelda combat; the right side is asteroids gameplay. Switch sides to succeed! Made in 72 hours for the 2022 Geo Jam hosted by Icoso!

Instructions

Arrow Keys/WASD to Move

Z to Attack

X to Dodge

Use the mouse to navigate menus

Full Screen is Highly Recommended

Credits

Art, sound effects, and code made by me during the 72 hours

The color palette is "Pen N Paper" by polyphrog on Lospec.com

All music is by squirrelsRcool on scratch (aka - How2Bboss - on youtube
